site.name: GRS Parbhani
site.description: Leading Government Residential School in Parbhani District

hero.title: Center of Quality Education
hero.subtitle: Join us for a bright future of your children

feature1.title: Quality Education
feature1.description: We believe in the holistic development of students under the guidance of modern teaching methods and experienced teachers. In our school, every student gets the opportunity to learn according to their ability.

feature2.title: Residential Facilities
feature2.description: Complete residential facilities are available including comfortable hostels, nutritious food, and safe environment. Students living in our hostels get a home-like atmosphere.

feature3.title: Academic Excellence
feature3.description: Students from our school are performing excellently in state and national competitions. We guide every student to reach their academic goals.

feature4.title: Sports & Recreation
feature4.description: Various sports facilities are available for physical development. Our students participate in many sports including cricket, football, badminton, kabaddi.

feature5.title: Scholarship Schemes
feature5.description: Various scholarship schemes are available for needy and meritorious students. We strive to ensure that no student's education is interrupted due to financial reasons.

feature6.title: Career Guidance
feature6.description: We help provide proper guidance and advice for students' future careers. Students can make right decisions by getting guidance from experts in various fields.

hostel.title: Hostel
hostel.description: Modern hostel equipped with facilities where students get a home-like atmosphere. Clean rooms, study arrangements and 24-hour security.

library.title: Library
library.description: Modern library with extensive book collection where books, magazines and reference books of all subjects are available.

mess.title: Mess
mess.description: Arrangement for nutritious and clean food. Balanced diet including local cuisine is important for students' health.

sports.title: Sports Facilities
sports.description: Comprehensive facilities for all sports necessary for physical development. Participation in inter-school and district level competitions.

labs.title: Laboratories
labs.description: Modern laboratories for science subjects where students can learn by doing practical experiments. Computer laboratory is also available.

health.title: Health Center
health.description: Qualified medical staff and primary treatment facilities are available to take care of students' health.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us or apply for admission
